title: sza diagnostic without solar zenith angle correction
description: There is a small correction term to the solar zenith angle that is applied in the model but not included in the sza diagnostic. This correction term has a small effect for large solar zenith angles. It takes the for : RRAE = 0.1277E-02 ; ZCRAE=RRAE*(RRAE+2.0) ; RMU=RRAE/((RMU**2+ZCRAE)**0.5-RMU) ; where RMU is the cosine of the solar zenith angle.
